Html:
Hello,

we merged 2 of the most interesting (IMHO) frameworks: Prism for the application architecture and AvalonDock for the GUI.

Let's have a look at it, and all comments and ideas to go ahead are welcome !

 

Bernard from Sofa, an AvalonDock wrapper.

Hi,

Thank you for sharing this with the community. We've added an entry in the Knowledge Base referencing your project.

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
